landing.description: I'm a software developer focused on front-end and mobile development.

about.title: About me
about.text: My name is Lucas Henrique Vicente, I'm <age> years old and I've been a software developer since 2019, in 2020 I graduated in Information Systems by FHO - Uniararas. I'm focused on the JavaScript and TypeScript technologies, I have experience with front-end web and hybrid mobile development using React, React Native and Ionic Framework. I also have experience building REST APIs using Node.js, I've worked with relational databases like MySQL and SQLite and non-relational databases like MongoDB and Firebase. I really like web development and my goal is to become an expert in front-end development.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: Here are listed some of the technologies that I've been using for the past few years, both in a work environment and in personal projects.

napp.title: Front-end Developer
napp.description: During my time at Napp Solutions I was responsible for the development and maintenance of web and mobile applications for commerce and marketplaces management using Node.js with TypeScript and JavaScript, the front-end was built with ReactJS and React Native, unit tests with Jest and React Testing Library, version control using Git and application prototyping using Figma

compsoft.title: Mobile Development Internship
compsoft.description: My first professional experience as a software developer was an internship at Compsoft. I was responsible for the development and maintenance of mobile applications aimed at managing inventory and sales. The technologies i was using were Typescript with the Ionic Framework. Also worked on a internal management system using React and Typescript.

texts.description: There are some projects i would like to highlight:
texts.moreProjects: More projects can be found on my Github profile.

descriptions.nlwCopa: Application built with React, React Native and Node.
descriptions.demyx: Music playing Discord bot built using Node.
descriptions.pokedexIonic: Application to list Pokémon built with Ionic.
descriptions.portfolio: This portfolio was built with Next.js

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Interested in my work? Send me a message.
